metadata.name: Yama no bōken #1 Norikura
metadata.description:
Mount Norikura (乗鞍岳, Norikura-dake) is a potentially active volcano located on the borders of Gifu and Nagano prefectures in Japan. It is part of the Hida Mountains.
this series of Yama no bōken illustrated by artist ponnyan the imagination illustrated the warm final rays of the late afternoon sun.The Norikura Plateau borders the mountain on its northern side in Nagano Prefecture the joy.
